definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]

sentences.english: A hillside studio-house in Ushimado , Japan, by Tezuka Architects.
sentences.chinese: 山坡工作室家中牛窗，日本，由手冢建築師。

sentences.english: Among all the drawings produced by architects, my favorites are the working drawings.
sentences.chinese: 在所有建築師畫的圖中，我最喜歡的是施工圖。

sentences.english: The conception of the tensegrity was proposed by Fuller, a famous American architect.
sentences.chinese: 張拉整體的概念是由美國著名建築師富勒提出的。

sentences.english: It tempers the enthusiasm of the architect, the life of the individual.
sentences.chinese: 它鍛造了建築師的熱情，錘鍊了個人的生活。

sentences.english: What the blueprint is to the builder the outline is to the writer.
sentences.chinese: 寫作提綱之於作家，就如同藍圖之於建築師一樣。

sentences.english: The detective detected that the arch was under the marching Arctic architects’ protection.
sentences.chinese: 偵察察覺拱門受到行進的北極建築師們的保護。

sentences.english: For example, honeybees are great builders. Beehive construction begins with finding a suitable site.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，蜜蜂是偉大的建築師，而絕非僅僅是蜇人。

sentences.english: Alterations to the terms of an insurance shall not be made without the approval of the Project Manager.
sentences.chinese: 未經建築師許可，不能擅自變更保險條款。

sentences.english: Five of the world’s top architects are competing to design it.
sentences.chinese: 五位世界頂尖建築師正在爲新館的設計展開競爭。

sentences.english: No one can stop the flight of the conceptual architects’ thought.
sentences.chinese: 誰也不能阻遏概念建築師的思想天馬行空。

sentences.english: Aware that this was the ultimate knowing situation, the Draughtsman replied 'yes.
sentences.chinese: 意識到這是最後一個機會，這個建築師回答說是。

sentences.english: The building was constructed from the design of that architect.
sentences.chinese: 這幢大樓是按那位建築師的設計建造的。

sentences.english: Often architects use smaller commissions as testing grounds for new ideas.
sentences.chinese: 通常建築師會將較小的項目作爲新點子的試驗田。

sentences.english: Architects' vertical leapfrogging, however, isn't likely to stop at the Burj Khalifa.
sentences.chinese: 然而建築師們的垂直躍升遊戲並不太可能就此止步。

sentences.english: Refer to Architect's General Specification for concrete strength and mortar mix.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土強度及灰漿混合比例須參照建築師之基本規範。

sentences.english: The architect drew the house in section.
sentences.chinese: 建築師畫出房子的剖面圖。

definition: to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]
head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
